author: lzybkr
body:
These proj files give us a decent (but not perfect) editing experience in VS for the most commonly touched dlls.

I didn't set up building, but there are 3 configurations to make it easier to see UNIX/NANO/FULL differences.

The references for Nano are just plain wrong, I'm not really sure how to fix those yet.

comments.author: vors
comments.body: Do you plan to keep them in sync with `project.json` files manually?

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: Hopefully VS will support project.json properly, but if need be, yeah, I'll update manually.

title: Add csproj files and sln for editing but not building
